728708f-a.title: Richmond: Clinton Place - Heberton Avenue
728708f-a.text:
Clinton Place (formerly Clinton Avenue), north side,
west from near Heberton Avenue, in the village of Port Richmond.
About 1910
By Vulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
728708f-a.folder: Clinton Place & Heberton Avenue, Staten Island, NY
